name: Valid Classic
summary: Legit soccer event with verified assignor.

name: Missing Slug
summary: Row should drop because slug is blank.

name: Bad Sport
summary: Contains a non-target sport and should drop.

name: No Location
summary: Missing city/state data triggers cleaner removal.

name: Duplicate Classic
summary: Duplicate slug of valid entry to trigger duplicate drop.

name: Bad URL
summary: Missing source URL so cleaner skips it.
